entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
